means: Computer-Aided Reliability Estimation 计算机辅助可靠性估价

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"焦虑，关心"之意。
means: anxiety ：指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
worry ：侧重对未知事态演变的忧虑。
care ：强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
concern ：作"关心"用时，是indifference(冷漠)的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"介意，在乎"之意。
means: care ： 指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
mind ： 通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"烦恼，担忧"之意。
means: worry ： 普通用词，着重使人焦虑、烦恼或深深不安。
brood语气比worry强，多指沉思、沮丧或忧郁。
care ： 多指极强烈的关心和忧虑。常带纯客观的意味。
fret ： 通常指因悲哀、焦虑或忧愁等所困扰的心理状态。

sentence.Network_en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentence.Network_cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentence.Network_en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
sentence.Network_cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

sentence.Network_en: She had met both sons and did not care for either.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个儿子她都见了，一个都不喜欢。

lj.lj_ly: write to me care of Ann.

phrase.cizu_name: I (或 he, she，等) couldn't (或北美，非正式 亦作

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)毫不在乎；完全不关心

lj.lj_ly: he couldn't care less about football.

phrase.cizu_name: for all you care (或 he, she，等 cares)

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to indicate that someone feels no interest or concern
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)你（或他、她）毫无兴趣；不关你（或他、她）的事

lj.lj_ly: I could drown for all you care.
lj.lj_ls: 我就是淹死也与你无关。

jx.jx_en_mean: [often in imperative]be cautious; keep oneself safe

lj.lj_ly: take care if you're planning to go out tonight.
lj.lj_ls: 如果你今晚打算外出，当心点。

lj.lj_ly: he would take care to provide himself with an escape clause.
lj.lj_ls: 他会确保自己得到免责条款。

jx.jx_en_mean: keep (someone or something) safe and provided for

lj.lj_ly: I can take care of myself.
he has the equipment to take care of my problem.
lj.lj_ls: 他有台可解决我的问题的设备。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English caru (noun), carian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Old High German chara 'grief, lament', charon 'grieve', and Old Norse kọr 'sickbed'

encyclopedia.content: 派生词 careful carefully careless carelessly 英语单词 care 英音：[kεə] 美音：[kεr] 词典解释： care 名词 n. 1. 看护；保护[U] Is he in the doctor's care? 他有医生治疗护理吗？ 2. 照料；管理；关怀[U] The baby needs a lot of care. 这婴孩需要精心照料。 3. 忧虑，烦恼；心事[C][U] He is now free from all care. 他如今无忧无虑。 4. 用心；努力[U] Caroline began to devote more care to her work. 凯

entry.def: If you care about something, you feel that it is important and are concerned about it.

example.ex: ...a company that cares about the environment.
example.tran: 注重环保的公司

example.ex: ...young men who did not care whether they lived or died...
example.tran: 不在乎死活的年轻人

entry.def: If you care for someone, you feel a lot of affection for them.

example.ex: He wanted me to know that he still cared for me.
example.tran: 他想要我知道他仍爱着我。

example.ex: ...people who are your friends, who care about you.
example.tran: 关爱你的朋友们

entry.def: If you care for someone or something, you look after them and keep them in a good state or condition.

example.ex: They hired a nurse to care for her.
example.tran: 他们雇了个护士来照顾她。

example.ex: ...these distinctive cars, lovingly cared for by private owners.
example.tran: 这些受到车主们悉心养护、与众不同的私家车

entry.def: Children who are in care are looked after by the state because their parents are dead or unable to look after them properly.

example.ex: ...a home for children in care...
example.tran: 儿童福利院

example.ex: She was taken into care as a baby.
example.tran: 她尚在襁褓中时就被福利院收养。

entry.def: If you say that you do not care for something or someone, you mean that you do not like them.

example.ex: She had met both sons and did not care for either.
example.tran: 两个儿子她都见了,一个都不喜欢。

entry.def: If you say that someone does something when they care to do it, you mean that they do it, although they should do it more willingly or more often.

example.ex: The woman tells anyone who cares to listen that she's going through hell...
example.tran: 只要一有人听她诉说，那个女人就会告诉人家她正在受苦受难。

example.ex: Experts reveal only as much as they care to.
example.tran: 专家们只透露了他们想透露的那些。

entry.tran: 愿意，要（一种有礼貌的询问）
entry.def: You can ask someone if they would care for something or if they would care to do something as a polite way of asking if they would like to have or do something.

example.ex: Would you care for some orange juice?...
example.tran: 来杯橙汁怎么样?

example.ex: He said he was off to the beach and would we care to join him.
example.tran: 他说他要去海滩,问我们愿不愿和他一块儿去。

entry.def: If you do something with care, you give careful attention to it because you do not want to make any mistakes or cause any damage.

example.ex: Condoms are an effective method of birth control if used with care...
example.tran: 如果使用得当,避孕套是很有效的避孕手段。

example.ex: We'd taken enormous care in choosing the location.
example.tran: 在地点的选择上我们格外谨慎。

entry.def: Your cares are your worries, anxieties, or fears.

example.ex: Lean back in a hot bath and forget all the cares of the day...
example.tran: 舒舒服服地躺着泡个热水澡,忘掉白天的一切烦恼。

example.ex: Johnson seemed without a care in the world.
example.tran: 约翰逊似乎无忧无虑。

entry.def: You can use for all I care to emphasize that it does not matter at all to you what someone does.

example.ex: You can go right now for all I care.
example.tran: 你现在就可以走,我才不在乎呢。

entry.tran: 毫不在意;毫不关心（美国英语中亦可用could care less）
entry.def: If you say that you couldn't care less about someone or something, you are emphasizing that you are not interested in them or worried about them. In American English, you can also say that you could care less, with the same meaning.

example.ex: I couldn't care less about the bloody woman...
example.tran: 那个该死的女人关我屁事!

example.ex: Personally, I couldn't have cared less whether the ice-cream came from Italy or England...
example.tran: 就我来说,我根本不在乎冰淇淋是意大利产的,还是英国产的。

entry.def: If someone sends you a letter or parcel care of a particular person or place, they send it to that person or place, and it is then passed on to you. In American English, you can also say in care of .

example.ex: Please write to me care of the publishers...
example.tran: 写给我的信请由出版商收转。

example.ex: I addressed their letters in care of the bars and clubs where I'd known them.
example.tran: 我把写给他们的信寄往我们结识时的酒吧和俱乐部,请它们代为转交。

entry.def: If you take care of someone or something, you look after them and prevent them from being harmed or damaged.

example.ex: There was no one else to take care of their children...
example.tran: 没有别人可以照料他们的孩子。

example.ex: You have to learn to take care of your possessions.
example.tran: 你得学会保管好自己的财物。

entry.def: You can say 'Take care' when saying goodbye to someone.
If you take care to do something, you make sure that you do it.

example.ex: Foley followed Albert through the gate, taking care to close the latch.
example.tran: 福利跟着艾伯特穿过大门,特意将门闩插好。

entry.def: To take care of a problem, task, or situation means to deal with it.

example.ex: They leave it to the system to try and take care of the problem...
example.tran: 他们让系统去设法解决这个问题。

example.ex: 'Do you need clean sheets?' — 'No. Mrs. May took care of that.'
example.tran: “您需要干净床单吗?”——“哦,不用了。梅夫人帮我换好了。”

entry.tran: (表示说话者毫不在乎)谁在乎?
entry.def: You can say 'Who cares?' to emphasize that something does not matter to you at all.

example.ex: Who cares about some stupid vacation?...
example.tran: 谁在乎什么愚蠢的度假?

example.ex: 'But we might ruin the stove.' — 'Who cares?'
example.tran: “可我们会把炉子弄坏的!”——“我才不在乎呢！”

means.word_mean: 1. the work of caring for or attending to someone or something;
2. judiciousness in avoiding harm or danger;

sentences.sentence: "he exercised caution in opening the door"
"they hushed it up out of fear of public reaction"
"his major care was the illness of his wife"

means.word_mean: 5. attention and management implying responsibility for safety;

sentences.sentence: "he is in the care of a bodyguard"

means.word_mean: 6. activity involved in maintaining something in good working order;

sentences.sentence: "he wrote the manual on car care"
"The nurse was caring for the wounded"

means.word_mean: 3. prefer or wish to do something;

sentences.sentence: "Do you care to try this dish?"
"Would you like to come along to the movies?"

means.word_mean: 4. be in charge of, act on, or dispose of;

sentences.sentence: "I can deal with this crew of workers"
"She managed her parents' affairs after they got too old"

auth_sentence.content: Still, I think our leaders care about us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, I think our leaders care about us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, I think our leaders care about us.

auth_sentence.content: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.

auth_sentence.content: Most of the time the NHS provides good care.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the time the NHS provides good care.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the time the NHS provides good care.

stems_affixes.word_buile: care关心,抚爱+ful有……的→adj.小心的,仔细的
care关心,抚爱→n.注意, 照料, v.关心, 顾虑, 照顾, 喜爱 v.在意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关心, 顾虑, 照顾, 喜爱
stems_affixes.word_buile: care关心,抚爱→n.注意, 照料, v.关心, 顾虑, 照顾, 喜爱 v.在意

abbreviation.mean_cn: 传达的真实性，问候，移情作用

means.word_mean: 关心, 担心, 在乎, 介意

sentences.en: I couldn't care less.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎。

sentences.en: She affected not to care.
sentences.cn: 她作出不在意的样子。

sentences.en: He failed in the examination but I don't think he cares very much.
sentences.cn: 他考试不及格, 但依我看, 他并不太在乎。

sentences.en: Please give me something to drink, I don't care which.
sentences.cn: 请给我点饮料喝一喝, 不管哪一种都行。

sentences.en: The captain cares the safety of both the crew and the passengers.
sentences.cn: 船长为船员和旅客们的安全操心。

sentences.en: Would you care to come and have a chat with me?
sentences.cn: 如果你不介意的话, 过来和我聊聊天好吗?

sentences.en: Carrie doesn't care how far she has to walk.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉不在乎她得走多远。

sentences.en: They didn't care if/whether it rained or not.
sentences.cn: 他们不在乎下雨还是不下雨。

sentences.en: I don't care whether he comes or not.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎他来不来。

sentences.en: I don't care whether it rains, I am happy.
sentences.cn: 我才不在乎下不下雨呢, 我快活着呢。

sentences.en: I don't care whether he stays or goes.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎他是留下来还是离去。

sentences.en: The boss never cared whether a worker should live or die.
sentences.cn: 老板从来不顾工人死活。

sentences.en: I don't care if you smoke.
sentences.cn: 你抽不抽烟, 我不在意。

sentences.en: I don't care to go on a hike.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢徒步旅行。

sentences.en: I don't care to see plays or films that depict murders or violence.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢看描写谋杀或暴力的戏剧或电影。

means.word_mean: 想要；希望；欲望[后接不定式，常用于否定、疑问及条件句中]

sentences.en: Anyone who cares to come will be welcome.
sentences.cn: 凡是愿意来的人一律欢迎。

sentences.en: Children need good care.
sentences.cn: 孩子需要很好照料。

sentences.en: Care killed a cat.
sentences.cn: 忧虑伤身。

sentences.en: Do you care if I open the window?
sentences.cn: 我打开窗户您介意吗?

means.word_mean: 喜爱，喜欢；对…中意(常与 for 连用)

sentences.en: She does not care very greatly for art.
sentences.cn: 她对艺术不十分感兴趣。

means.word_mean: 照顾，照料，照看；赡养(常与 for 连用)

sentences.en: Who is to care for me when I'm old?
sentences.cn: 我年老时谁来照顾我呢?

means.word_mean: 希望；想要；想做(常与 for 连用)

sentences.en: Do you care for more cake?
sentences.cn: 您还要点蛋糕吗?

jushi.english: He failed in the examination but I don't think he cares very much.
jushi.chinese: 他考试不及格,但依我看,他并不太在乎。
